ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: It seems to me that if you hail an NPC in common tounge, they will respond in common tongue, and that will not help you learn any languages at all. In a
ygData.messageBody:
It seems to me that if you hail an NPC in common tounge, they will respond in
common tongue, and that will not help you learn any languages at all.



In a message dated 5/11/99 6:55:51 AM Eastern Daylight Time, Strife@...
writes:

<<
I remember hearing about a Gnoll NPC in West Karana, that loads some sort of
shovel. Two things:

1. Can you hail the gnoll and get a responce? ANd then do it over and over
to learn gnoll?

2. Has anyone looted the shovel? If so, >>
